body.name: Lahome Modern Abstract Runner Rug - 2x8 Red Hallway Runner Rugs with Rubber Backing Non Skid Laundry Room Rug, Kitchen Carpet Runner Indoor Bathroom Floor Runners for Entrance Living Room Bedroom

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Modern Abstract Area Rug] - Add a pop of color to your living room or bedroom with this area rug. Designed with a delicate palette, this collection impresses with an abstract print with splashes of red, blue, yellow, and beige grey hues. Its purposefully faded look fits right in modern industrial and contemporary homes.

[Safety Non-Slip Rug] - Our indoor door mat made of extra-absorbent fabric top layer and thousands of anti-skid TPE backing which is safe for everyday indoor high traffic area from kid or pet activity. (Keep the bottom of the rug always be dry.)

[Soft Medium-Pile Throw Rug] - The bedroom rug made of enhanced synthetic durable faux wool fibers, not only ultra-soft but also resists color fading. 0.3inch thick low-pile allows for convenient placement in entryways, underneath furniture, and will not obstruct doorways.

[Functional Runner Rug] - A runner rug is perfect for long, narrow kitchens and entryways. Or, put a rug runner for the foot of a favorite easy chair.For doormat, hallyway, bathroom, laundry room, family room, bedside, a rectangle abstract mat are also prerfect for daily use.

[Easy Clean Rug] - Offering endless convenience for every lifestyle, our mats are safe in the washing machine. Also for daily cleaning with vacuum cleaner, broom, or wipe. Easily to keep a new looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft carpet, subdued colors
reviews.reviewText: The rug seems well made with a good edge binding and a rubbery gripper mesh built into the backing. It is very soft. The colors aren’t as intense as it seemed in the photos, but it is a good fit for my bedroom. The rug is not very deep/thick so I ordered a 1/4” pad with it and the combination is working well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I think the rugs are beautiful. I ordered the rugs in almost every size. They are beautiful, soft to touch and very soft on the feet. Incredibly soft to be honest with you. They stay in place, and really did exceed my expectations. If I had one negative, I wish they were a tad bit darker but I do not regret buying them. I bought the red multi colored ones. Although they may get dirty quicker because of the lighter colors in the rug, the rugs are washable so I'm not worried; just wash with care. These were well priced, and I would definitely purchase them again. I highly recommend them most definitely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Colors are great, Super soft! Washes well, but doesn’t stay put on hard floors
reviews.reviewText: This may be one of the softest rugs I’ve had. Great quality! Washes well (didn’t put in dryer). The only downside for me is that it doesn’t stay put on hard floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great area rug!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my grandbaby's room (blue) and living room (multi red) and the colors match up beautifully. I am very happy that the red one is not as dark as the pictures seen in the advertisement. Also it's more burgundy than red.It is very soft and non slip since it has a "rubber" backing. Soooo happy that I bought it. It helps now when our crawling grandbaby comes over. Our adult children like it too. No more hard floors to sit on. It's not padded as a normal rug but at least it does help sitting on a hard floor and it's soft.Not sure if a regular vacuum should be used on it. It may get sucked up into it.And this 5x7 is probably too large for my front load washer. Maybe rolling or folding it up would help with that?It lays flat. Not sure about stain resistance since it's new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The rug is really nice and soft. I think you have to take it to a laundromat to wash it. It’s too big for my washer. But it’s very nice rug. Great for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars These are NOT non- skid.
reviews.reviewText: These rugs are beautiful. The quality is ok. They were very light weight and had absolutely no traction on the bottom of the rug. These slid all over the place when the dogs ran by or the kids walked by. They do not stay in place. I loved this color but sadly because of the poor quality of the bottom of the rugs, I returned them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful colors! So thick and soft!
reviews.reviewText: This rug exceeds my expectation. It is beautiful. Looks much better in person. I am so happy I chose this rug. I cannot attest to cleaning or stain resistance because I have only had it for a week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love, love the colors, love the softness and I have two of the same rugs and going to buy another one. Worth the money.
Tiene buena calidad y es justo como la imagen, solo que viene muy doblado y a pesar de las semanas no se ha vuelto totalmente liso
Was looking for a low pile area rug. This is perfect for my needs. Very soft to the touch. Looks great and gives the room a cozy feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have been looking for a round rug for a while now to compliment a larger rug I have in my lounge. This is just perfect. Lovely colour, good quality. Arrived rolled up so has taken a little while to flatten into shape but it is just exactly what I was looking for. Would most definitely recommend
